TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 将颜色从一种数据类型转换为另一种数据类型。

span.span: Converts colors from one data type to another.
Access this class through the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从字符串到转换时需要非限定的颜色名称; 否则为将在转换过程中出现异常。When converting from a string to a the expects the unqualified color name; otherwise, an exception will occur in the conversion process. 例如，您应将传递"蓝色"，不是"System.Drawing.Color.Blue"或"Color.Blue"给方法。For example, you should pass "Blue", not "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" or "Color.Blue", to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将此代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowColorConverter`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowColorConverter` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Converters#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Converters#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Converters#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/VB/form1.vb#2)]
